benchmark_details.name: FilmEval
benchmark_details.overview: FilmEval is a comprehensive benchmark for evaluating AI-generated films across key cinematic dimensions, covering narrative, audiovisual techniques, aesthetics, rhythm, engagement, and overall quality.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To establish a new benchmark for the holistic evaluation of AI-generated films.

data.source: Generated films based on input themes and reference images.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are evaluated based on scores for criteria assessing different cinematic aspects.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better adherence to cinematic principles and overall film quality.
methodology.validation: Empirical validation through user studies and correlation with human evaluation.
